basic.floral_language:
Sedum multiceps
Floriography: innocent, cute, exquisite
Has a cute and exquisite appearance with clustered needle leaves on top of stems tightly arranged in small spherical shape, very lovely. Easy to grow and take care, commonly used in small and miniature bonsai.
Likes sunlight, when in the summer dormant period, leaves crunch together, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers are yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, apparent dormancy in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, stop watering in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
